'''Gareth Jones''' ([[6 June|June 6]], [[1925]] - [[30 November|November 30]], [[1958]]) was an English actor, primarily known for his radio work. Though popular myth has it he died in the recording booth during his characters actual death scene, he actually suffered a cardiac arrest in make-up in between scenes. 

==Roles==
* [[1954]]: ''[[The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth, Beorhthelm's Son (radio play)]]'' - Unspecified
